quiz_questions.question: What is the main topic of Lecture 3 in the NLP course?
quiz_questions.explanation: The lecture overview states that the focus of Lecture 3 is Language Models.

quiz_questions.question: What is the duration of Lecture 3 in the NLP course?
quiz_questions.explanation: The lecture details specify that the duration of Lecture 3 is 90 minutes.

quiz_questions.question: What is one of the key learning outcomes of Lecture 3?
options: B) Implementation of algorithms related to N-grams, perplexity, LSTM language models
quiz_questions.explanation: The key learning outcomes state that students will be able to implement algorithms related to N-grams, perplexity, LSTM language models.

quiz_questions.question: What is the time complexity of typical implementations of Language Models?
quiz_questions.explanation: The detailed content section states that the time complexity of typical implementations is O(n²).

quiz_questions.question: What is the space complexity of typical implementations of Language Models?
quiz_questions.explanation: The detailed content section states that the space complexity of typical implementations is O(n).

quiz_questions.question: What is one of the real-world applications of Language Models?
quiz_questions.explanation: The real-world applications section mentions e-commerce recommendation systems as one of the use cases.

quiz_questions.question: What is the task in the hands-on exercise for Lecture 3?
options: A) Implement Language Models and achieve >80% accuracy on test set
B) Implement Language Models and achieve >85% accuracy on test set
C) Implement Computer Vision and achieve >90% accuracy on test set
D) Implement Data Mining and achieve >95% accuracy on test set
quiz_questions.explanation: The hands-on exercise section specifies that the task is to implement Language Models and achieve >85% accuracy on test set.

quiz_questions.question: What is the due date for the homework assignment for Lecture 3?
quiz_questions.explanation: The homework assignment section states that the due date is next week before lecture.

quiz_questions.question: What is one of the additional resources provided for Lecture 3?
options: D) Dataset: UCI Machine Learning Repository - Computer Vision Dataset
quiz_questions.explanation: The additional resources section mentions the paper "Advances in Language Models" (2024) as one of the resources.

quiz_questions.question: Where can students attend office hours for the NLP course?
quiz_questions.explanation: The office hours section states that students can attend office hours on Wednesdays 3-5 PM, Room 302.
